document.full_text: iranian president mahmoud ahmadinejad called for unity in the middle east on monday, a conciliatory message that contrasted starkly with another senior figure who accused saudi arabia of "heresy and deception."
document.title: iran calls for regional unity, hits out at saudi arabia
lines_and_colors: iranian president mahmoud ahmadinejad called for unity in the middle east on monday, a conciliatory message that contrasted starkly with another senior figure who accused saudi arabia of "heresy and deception."
